title: How roller derby blocked the blockchain
description:
What happened when three stars of roller derby tried to bring NFTs into the arena? Sara Morrison (@SaraMorrison) tells us the saga.

Read Sara’s story: https://www.vox.com/recode/22992646/roller-derby-nfts-crypto

Today’s episode was produced and engineered by Jon Ehrens and hosted by Rani Molla.

Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts
